item.text: Captured by giants and forced to cook their hideous provender. Returned because
Enslaved by goblins and made to perform the worst sorts of drudgery. Returned because
Compelled by Elves to entertain them. Returned because
Feted at Elfking's Court. Cannot forget the delights experienced. Returned because
Performed a service and received Fey's ambiguous gratitude. Returned because
Foolish enough to hunt a Fey-beast amid the forests of the night. Returned because
Pursued by the Wild Hunt, and it haunts you still. Returned because
Caught-up in a Fey War, the ferocity which still leaves you in wonder. Returned because
Unlucky enough to fall in love with a Fey who is now lost to you. Returned because
they were jealous of your appearance. You lost
the elves thought you ugly or uncouth. You lost
you cast a romantic eye on the wrong person. You lost
you were accused of discourtesy. You lost
you escaped their huntsmen. You lost
they thought you were unappetizing. You lost
you hid from their mocking laughter. You lost
you spurned their lascivious embraces. You lost
you fled from their hideous slaughter. You lost
you requested their leave, which was eventually granted. You lost
the stars were right. You lost
